 Found a great app for taxi rides. 
 
 I advise you to try the link in the official Google store: 

 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.taxi_pas_4

"Cost of traveling along the route " The application transmits your mobile phone number to enable the taxi ordering function. By clicking the Save button, you confirm your consent to transfer the phone number to the dispatcher to search for the car and save it for future orders.Wait, the connection is in progress. Payment in cash. Cash Bonus Check with dispatcher Blocked bonuses My bonuses get bonuses Update your bonus information Don't forget to collect the bonus for the next day. Rules for calculating bonuses: - Registration in the application - 1 bonus; - First order - 1 bonus; - Completed route - 1 bonus for every 1 whole hryvnia of the completed amount; - Login to the application - 1 bonus is credited no more than once a day. Bonuses can be used when ordering trips, provided that such a service is available in the address database you have chosen, as well as if the cost of the trip is fully covered by available bonuses at the rate of 100 bonuses = UAH 1. For up-to-date information and accrual of bonuses - click the button - GET BONUSES Apply selection Information about the number of bonuses has been updated Departure point "To order, press the button " Clear fields Card

Try changing the search parameters 2. Specify the drop-off location on the map Privacy Policy We value your trust and are committed to ensuring that your personal data is securely protected. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal data as part of your use of our app. In order to provide taxi ordering functionality in our application, we collect and store users' mobile phone numbers. These data are necessary to contact you and provide the taxi ordering service. By using our app and providing us with your personal data, you consent to the collection, use and transfer of that data in accordance with this privacy policy. We take all necessary measures to ensure the security of your personal data and prevent unauthorized access to them. Our application complies with the provisions of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the European Union regarding the collection, use and processing of personal data. You have the right at any time to request access to your personal data, to make changes or to delete it from our database. To do this, contact us at taxi.easy.ua@gmail.com. By using our app, you agree to the terms of our privacy policy. We reserve the right to make changes to this policy and you will be notified. You have the right at any time to request access to your personal data, to make changes or to delete it from our database. To do this, contact us at taxi.easy.ua@gmail.com. If you have any further questions or concerns about your privacy and data, please contact us at the contact address below. Andrii Korzhov Privacy About the author Other "order in " Wait, checking data. Trip cancellation due to payment timeout. Try again. The trip was canceled due to lack of payment. Try again.
